sentence.Network_en: She always listened earnestly as if this might help her to understand.
sentence.Network_cn: 她总是很认真地听，就好像这能帮助她弄明白一样。

sentence.Network_en: She looked at him earnestly. "You don't mind?"
sentence.Network_cn: 她认真地看着他说：“你不介意吗？”

entry.def: If you say something earnestly, you say it very seriously, often because you believe that it is important or you are trying to persuade someone else to believe it.

example.ex: In 1990, we were all earnestly assured that property values could only go up.
example.tran: 1990年时我们都得到信誓旦旦的保证说房地产只可能升值。

entry.def: If you do something earnestly, you do it in a thorough and serious way, intending to succeed.

example.ex: She always listened earnestly as if this might help her to understand.
example.tran: 她总是很认真地听，就好像这能帮助她弄明白一样。

entry.def: If you earnestly hope or wish for something, you hope or wish strongly and sincerely for it.

example.ex: I earnestly hope what I learned will serve me well in my new job.
example.tran: 我非常希望能够在自己的新工作中学以致用。

sentences.sentence: "a play dealing seriously with the question of divorce"

sentences.en: I earnestly advised him to cooperate.
I earnestly wish I could have been present at the meeting yesterday.
sentences.cn: 我倒真愿意能参加昨天的会议。

sentences.en: It is earnestly hoped that you’ll attend out tea party.
sentences.cn: 诚挚地希望你参加我们的茶会。

sentences.en: The boy earnestly asked that his application be granted.
sentences.cn: 那孩子热切地要求批准他的申请。

sentences.en: We are earnestly seeking after the truth.
